### Current Portfolio Companies

![portfolio_company_logo](https://www.nexphase.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/Behavior-Frontiers-logo-color.svg)

Investment Date:

**April 2025**

Industry:

**Healthcare**

Website:

[**behaviorfrontiers.com**](https://www.behaviorfrontiers.com/)

Behavior Frontiers is a provider of Applied Behavior Analysis (“ABA”) therapy for children with autism. The Company offers autism treatment services through a multi-modal care model, delivering services in therapy centers and patients’ homes. Behavior Frontiers is headquartered in Los Angeles, CA.

![portfolio_company_logo](https://www.nexphase.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/ISI-Logo-Color.svg)

Investment Date:

**May 2024**

Industry: Software

**Software**

Website:

[**insurancesystems.com**](https://insurancesystems.com/)

Insurance Systems ("ISI") is a provider of end-to-end software solutions to the Property & Casualty insurance industry. Its flagship product, ISI Enterprise, includes modules for policy administration, claims, billing, accounting and reinsurance, allowing carriers to manage the full policy lifecycle. ISI is headquartered in Toronto, ON.

[Meet a CEO](https://www.nexphase.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/NexPhase_ISI_SHORT_H264.mp4)

![portfolio_company_logo](https://www.nexphase.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/tubbytodd_logo.svg)

Investment Date:

**July 2022**

Industry:

**Consumer**

Website:

[**tubbytodd.com**](https://tubbytodd.com/)

Tubby Todd is a direct-to-consumer marketer of clean and effective baby and family personal care products focused on sensitive skin conditions including eczema. Products are sold under the Tubby Todd brand and include healing ointments, creams/lotions, soap, suncare and haircare.

![portfolio_company_logo](https://www.nexphase.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Aztec_Logo_2Clr_OrgBlu_PMS.png)

Investment Date:

**April 2022**

Industry:

**Software**

Website:

[**aztecsoftware.com**](https://www.aztecsoftware.com/)

Aztec Software ("Aztec") is a SaaS-based education platform that offers a continuum of tailored content focused on adult learners at various education levels, including Adult Basic Education and High School Equivalency programs, workforce / employability skills / college readiness training, and Career & Technical Education. Aztec is headquartered in Springfield, NJ.

![portfolio_company_logo](https://www.nexphase.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Metz-Logo.png)

Investment Date:

**December 2021**

Industry:

**Healthcare**

Website:

[**metzculinary.com**](https://metzculinary.com/)

Metz Culinary Management (“Metz”) is a diversified food services business providing outsourced food service (“FSM”) and environmental services (“EVS”) management on behalf of hospitals & other healthcare facilities, schools, and other retail locations. In addition, Metz delivers frozen and pre-packaged meals to seniors at home. Metz is headquartered in Dallas, PA.

![portfolio_company_logo](https://www.nexphase.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/Calcium-logo-color.svg)

Investment Date:

**November 2021**

Industry:

**Healthcare**

Website:

[**calciumusa.com**](https://www.calciumusa.com/)

Calcium is an award-winning, healthcare marketing agency offering a comprehensive range of leading-edge strategic, creative, and engagement capabilities – all focused on delivering robust brand nourishment and business growth for clients.

![portfolio_company_logo](https://www.nexphase.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/New-Selerix-Logo-Blue-Red.png)

Investment Date:

**August 2021**

Industry:

**Software**

Website:

[**selerix.com**](https://www.selerix.com/)

Selerix is a leading provider of benefits administration solutions for core and voluntary employee benefits. Its flexible platform simplifies enrollment, enhances data accuracy, and delivers advanced decision-support tools and tailored benefits education - all backed by Selerix's robust client service. The Selerix platform also includes ACA reporting and benefits communication tools, providing a comprehensive, all-in-one solution.

Trusted by brokers, carriers, and more than 26,000 employer groups serving 14 million enrollees, Selerix is committed to making benefits administration seamless and effective for employees and employers alike. Selerix is based on McKinney, TX.

![portfolio_company_logo](https://www.nexphase.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Oliver_Logo_Color.svg)

Investment Date:

**March 2021**

Industry

**Consumer**

Website:

[**oliverwinery.com**](https://www.oliverwinery.com/)

Oliver Winery & Vineyards is a top 30 US winery focused on approachable, flavor-forward and low-ABV wines such as Moscato.

![portfolio_company_logo](https://www.nexphase.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/dealeron_logo.svg)

Investment Date:

**November 2019**

Industry:

**Software**

Website:

[**dealeron.com**](https://www.dealeron.com/)

DealerOn is a provider of cloud-based digital marketing technology for the retail automotive industry. The Company serves its customers through its proprietary sales enablement software platform as well as its technology-based sales & marketing tools. DealerOn is headquartered in Rockville, MD.

![portfolio_company_logo](https://www.nexphase.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/knowfully_logo.svg)

Investment Date:

**November 2019**

Industry:

**Software**

Website:

[**knowfully.com**](https://www.knowfully.com/)

KnowFully is an education technology platform serving the accounting, finance, and healthcare industries that enables professionals to prepare for and achieve licensure and complete ongoing continuing professional education requirements throughout their careers. The Company serves customers through an omnichannel, multi-modal strategy, leveraging an extensible shared services platform to distribute content. KnowFully is based in Radnor, PA.

![portfolio_company_logo](https://www.nexphase.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/clearway_pain_solutions_new_logo2.svg)

Moelis Capital Partners made its initial investment in April of 2011 and NMSC was sold to American Securities LLC and affiliates of Leonard Green & Partners in April of 2016.
